name: Rashid

top_projects.name: 3D-renderer
top_projects.description: A console-based 3D renderer that uses ASCII characters to display and rotate 3D shapes

top_projects.name: simple-online-tic-tac-toe-multiplayer
top_projects.description: A simple online multiplayer tic-tac-toe game with js and flask

hackercry04/frontend.summary: Recent activities in the frontend repository have focused on enhancing the user interface, with multiple commits aimed at creating a mobile-friendly and beautiful UI for the front end. Additionally, efforts have been made to improve the project's security by converting all HTTP links to HTTPS and preparing the project for hosting.

hackercry04/3D-renderer.summary: The 3D-renderer repository has seen significant activity with the initial commit of the 3D Character Geometry Engine, followed by updates to the README.md file and the creation of a LICENSE file. These changes indicate a focused effort on setting up and refining the project's foundation and documentation.

hackercry04/ecommerce.summary: Activities in the ecommerce repository have centered around preparing the project for hosting, with adjustments made to the project structure, including the addition of .gitignore files for the Django backend and React frontend. This preparation work suggests that the project is moving towards deployment.

hackercry04/backend.summary: Recent activity in the backend repository includes a commit related to creating an EC2 copy of the Django backend, indicating efforts to deploy or mirror the backend infrastructure on Amazon EC2 for potentially improved scalability and reliability.

profile_summary: I'm Rashid, a developer with a strong foundation in Python, JavaScript, and Ruby, leveraging my skills to build innovative solutions across 18 public repositories. With a growing network of 3 followers, I'm committed to collaborative development and continuous learning. I'm excited to share my projects and experiences, driving growth and improvement in the tech community.
